purpose: To describe a successful retention strategy for identifying high-value customer segments and anticipating future attrition.
title: A successful retention strategy can identify high value customer segments and anticipate future attrition

bullets.text: Score customer profitability or Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
Assess the propensity of a customer to attrite
Segment customers leveraging CLV scores and propensity model
Identify reasons why customers might have soft attrition and design solutions proactively
Set-up dedicated in-bound retention unit to prevent hard attrition and improve retention of high value members
Implement retention strategies using a dedicated retention unit
Monitor critical KPIs to assess performance of retention efforts
Institute test & learn capabilities to continuously refine strategies

reasoning_strategy: Provide a structured approach to retention strategy.
layout: Horizontal steps with bullet points and a 2x2 matrix diagram
